name: Arctic Infiltration
description:
Pilot your heavily armed tactical Submersible and descend many miles below the Arctic surface to explore a sprawling underwater military facility seized by terrorists who are threatening a worldwide nuclear missile strike.

Your mission: Infiltrate the base, rescue the hostages and eliminate the threat.

  • Full 360 degree movement inside a fully immersive cockpit - strafe, roll, ascend, descend, pitch and yaw your way through various underwater environments
  • Unleash devastating weaponry to destroy enemy subs, such as the "Shredder" high velocity twin minigun, the "Nuclear Storm" missile swarm or "Sonic Torpedos" which track an enemy's sonar
  • Battle a variey of enemy submersibles, each with different strengths, weaknesses, attacks and abilities such as drones, bombers or the deadly stealth unit that hides using cloak technology
  • Activate the "Mining Drill" to cut through ice, debris and obstacles - or manipulate the "Robotic Arm" to activate switches, open doors and solve puzzles
  • Avoid environmental hazards such as falling debris, proximity mines and radiation zones

Our game is in development, all funds will be used only to finish creating the full game, and also make VR version.  Everyone who supports us and downloads our game,will get added to our email database and receive a standard and VR version of the full game when its completed.
